T

takeDamage(int) - Method in interface MagicEffectRealization
Negative amount must throw IllegalArgumentException; a typical implementation will reduce the object's HP by amount ensuring however that HP does not become negative.
takeDamage(int) - Method in class Wizard
Reduce the object's HP by amount ensuring however that HP does not become negative.
takeDamagePercent(int) - Method in interface MagicEffectRealization
Percentage must be between 0 and 100 (inclusive) otherwise an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; a typical implementation will reduce the object's HP by the percentage given of the object's basic HP value ensuring however, that HP does not become negative.
takeDamagePercent(int) - Method in class MagicItem
Reduce usages to usages*(1-percentage/100.)
takeDamagePercent(int) - Method in class Wizard
Reduce the object's HP by the percentage given of the object's basic HP value ensuring however, that HP does not become negative.
toString() - Method in class MagicItem
Formats this object according to "['name'; 'weight' g; 'price' 'currencyString'; 'usages' 'usageString''additionalOutputString']" 'currencyString' is "Knut" if price is 1, "Knuts" otherwise e.g.
toString() - Method in class Spell
Return output in format "['name'('levelNeeded'): 'manaCost' mana'additionalOutputString']"; where 'levelNeeded' is displayed as asterisks (see MagicLevel.toString) e.g.
toString() - Method in class Wizard
Returns a string in the format "['name'('level'): 'HP'/'basicHP' 'MP'/'basicMP'; 'money' 'KnutOrKnuts'; knows 'knownSpells'; carries 'inventory']"; where 'level' is the asterisks representation of the level (see MagicLevel.toString) and 'knownSpells' and 'inventory' use the default toString method of Java Set; 'KnutOrKnuts' is Knut if 'money' is 1, Knuts otherwise.
Tradeable - Interface in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number
Tradeable objects can be traded and stored in inventories
Trader - Interface in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number
Trader objects have an inventory in which they can store magic items.
transfer(Trader, Trader) - Method in interface Tradeable
Caution: this method transfers the item from from's inventory to to's inventory without any checks.
tryUsage() - Method in class MagicItem
If usages > 0 reduce usage by 1 and return true, otherwise return false
type - Variable in class AttackingSpell
Defines, if HP or MP is affected.
type - Variable in class HealingSpell
Defines, if HP or MP is affected
